div.p: ROYAL is a sub-tag in BIOGRAPHY PERSONNAME . It refers to names, such as Queen or Princess, which a person has because of their royal status. This element does not capture information about noble titles in general (cf. titled) but includes specifically royal names, e.g. Queen Elizabeth I. It has optional attributes of REG and WROTEORPUBLISHEDAS.

div.codeblock: This has been used inconsistently: Elizabeth I, but Queen Victoria.

div.p: See PERSONNAME for general name practices.
